Fully Made from Beech Wood: The entire body and steps are made from natural, kiln-dried beech wood. This provides a long-lasting, sturdy and aesthetic structure
Reinforced Mounting Structure: Structure compressed with hidden dowels and high-strength wood glue, reinforced with long bolt screws from four separate points
Durable Metal Hinge System: Galvanized hinge plates used in the upper connection keep the ladder angle fixed, preventing slipping and providing extra safety
Metal Balance Bars: Iron support bars on both sides prevent the ladder from bending sideways and provide maximum stability during use
Double-Sided Use: Thanks to the A-type form, you can safely exit from whichever side you prefer
Over-Opening Prevention Lock Chain: The durable chain located in the lower section prevents the ladder from opening too much, ensuring safe operation
Safe Use Against Electricity: The wooden body structure reduces contact-related risks in electrical work (note: metal parts are load-bearing and do not require contact during use)
Lightweight and Portable: With its easy open and close structure, it can be easily carried in areas such as home, office, workshop and warehouse
